text: Hi Krishna, confirming that there are no bulk actions available today for your use case. would you mind telling me more about what you mean by 'starting a webchat conversation'? Feel free to send me a DM, with more details of this use case, screenshots, if any, and what type of app you are building.
Thanks, Joshua, can you tell me more about what you are trying to solve? And why activities tab? What would the card do there?

Thanks, Tom, so to summarize this - because you can now create custom user properties on user object, you would like to be able to fetch those through context. Did I get that right?

Unfortunately, we may not add a lot more into context, but we are thinking of some better native options that allow you to fetch the first party data easily. We are still in brainstorming stage, so your use cases are handy, and I will keep you all posted through product updates!

<@U07AF9L3G12> <@U04FYBV18UE> since you upvoted these, would you mind sharing your use cases?
